<div class='specification'>

<p>Any apples with a mass less than 95&thinsp;g are classified as small.</p>
</div>

<div class='question' style='padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 20px;'>

<div class='question_part_label'>a.ii.</div>
</div>
<div class='question' style='padding-left: 20px; padding-right: 20px;'>
